preqs: Any one of the following units: ATS3011, ATS3031, ATS3013, ATS3033, ATS3014, ATS3034, ATS3041, ATS3042, ATS2015, ATS2035, ATS2016, ATS2036, ATS3015, ATS3035, ATS3016, ATS3036 or by permission.

rules.ruleString: Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {APG5032, ATS3032, ATS4012, ATS4032}

For commencement date before `01-JAN-2014` Do Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ATS1011, ATS1031, ATS2011, ATS2031, ATS3011, ATS3031, CHI3110, CHI3911} Otherwise Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ATS2015, ATS2016, ATS2035, ATS2036, ATS3011, ATS3013, ATS3014, ATS3015, ATS3016, ATS3031, ATS3033, ATS3034, ATS3035, ATS3036, ATS3041, ATS3042}

description: Through an investigation into the key intellectual issues of a multi-disciplinary nature in post-Mao China, this unit will introduce students to a range of literary writings by a young generation of contemporary Chinese writers. Through  various research projects  students will explore a range of different representations of Chinese culture and society.
